entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of wet flurries changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight. Wet snow mixed with rain beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023
